Function DB-DELETE

Syntax:

db-delete db key &key transaction auto-commit flags => boolean

Arguments and Values:

db---a db or a cursor

key---if db is a db, a string; otherwise nil

transaction---a transaction

auto-commit---a boolean

flags---an integer

boolean---a boolean

Description:

Deletes a record from the database. If db is a cursor, deletes the current record, otherwise deletes all records associated with key. If transaction is not supplied, the current transaction (from *transaction*) is used.
